Type Key

TypeAbbreviation

StringS

Basic Operators


nametypesinfooverload
!N|CN: 1-N (logical not, complementary probability)
C: swap case		new
#LA#ALA#A: map
$S|L|NS|L: sort least to greatest
N: bitwise not		sort
%NN|BNNN: mod
BN: repeat B N times		mod/rmod
&NN|SSNN: bitwise and
SS: list all expressions matching the regex		and/rand
*NNNN: multiplymul/rmul
+NN|CC|SA|ASNN|CC: add
SA|AS: append string		add/radd
-NN|CCNN|CC: subtractsub/rsub
/NNNN: dividediv/rdiv
:L:B|LN:E|LN:AL:B: map
LN:E: apply block to item at index N
LN:A: set index
;AA: pop and discard
<NN|CC|SSNN|CC|SS: less thanlt
=AAAA: equalityeq
>NN|CC|SSNN|CC|SS: greater thangt
?AAAA: if A1, then A2. If A2 is block, execute it
@AAAAAA: rotates the top three elements on the stack [abc->bca]
AAA: wrap in list
BN|C|LN|C: increment
L: uncons from front		inc
DALNALN: set indexsetindex
EN|L|SN: 10^N
L|S: length		len
FLBLB: fold from right to left
GS|NS: read a string from a filename or URL
N: isprime
HSNN|LNN|NNNSNN|LNN|NNN: convert base of N|S|L from N1 to N2
ILL|LN|LBLL|LN: get index
LB: filter		getindex
KLL|LA|AL|AALL: concatenate lists (modify list 1)
LA|AL: add to list (modify list)
AA: create list [ A A ]
LAN|NL|LLAN: create list by repeating A N times
NL|LL: reshape
NSS|LA|DJ|DSSS|LA: return index of first occurance, -1 if not found
DJ|DS: contains key
PAA: to stringstr
QN|LN: N>0: random number 0-N, N<0: random number N-0, N=0: any int
L: random choice		random
RN|C|LN|C: range [1, 2 .. N]
L: len L = 2: range [N1, N1+1, ..., N2], len l = 3: range [N1, N2, ..., N3]		range
SLL: sum (fold using +)
TNN: negatenegate
ULL: reversereverse
VN|C|LN|C: increment
L: uncons from back		dec
WB|DB: while loop (repeat as long as block returns true)
D: export all variables
XAA: assign to global variable x and pop from stack
YAA: assign to global variable y and leave on stack
ZN|SN: cast to bignum
S: parse to bignum
\AAAA: swap top two elements on the stack
^NN|SSNN: power
SS: levenshtein distance		pow/rpow
_AA: deepcopy (duplicate)
|NN|SSNN: logical or
SS: split S1 using regex S2		or/ror
~B|S|C|LB|S|C: evaluate
L: dump to stack

Dot Operators


nametypesinfooverload
.|NN: absolute valueabs
.~S|J|CS: parse contents to a block
J|C: deref variable; if not a block, put contents in block
.!N|SN: signum
S: parse if number		signum
.$LBLB: sort leat to greatest by applying B to L
.%NNNN: integer divisionidiv/ridiv
.&SSSSSS: replace all occurances of the regex S1 with S2 in S3
.'N|SN|S: cast to char
.+NNNN: gdc
.-NN|LN|LLNN: lcm
LN: remove item at index N from L
LL: remove items at indices L1 from L2
./NN: ceilingceil
.;..A..A: clear the entire stack
.<LN|SN|NN|SS|CCLN: head / pad 0
SN: head / pad ' '
NN|SS|CC: lesser of		head
.=LL|AL|LALL|AL|LA: element-wise equivalence
.>LN|SN|NN|CC|SSLN: tail / pad 0
SN: tail / pad ' '
NN|CC|SS: greater of		tail
.?AAAAAA: if A1 then A2, else A3. If A2/A3 are blocks, execute
.@..AN..AN: moves the Nth item on the stack (not including N) to the top
.A..A..A: wrap entire stack in a list
.BALAL: append item to the back of a list
.DSS: interrupts the program and throws an error message
.ELL: length, keep list on stacklen
.FLL: flatten nested list
.GASNASN: write A as a string to file located at S. N = 0, overwrite. N = 1, append
.ILN|LL|LBLN|LL: index, keep list on stack
LB: filter, keep list on stack
.KBBBB: try B1, if error, execute B2. Neither block has access to the global stack
.NLBLB: return the index of the first element of L that satifies E
.PAA: print to stdout
.Q--: return a random decimal from 0 to 1
.RNN: range [0, 1, .., N-1]
.S.S.S: returns the first element of a list. if the first element is a block, evaluate
.TLL: transpose a 2d list
.USS: requests a string using a ui dialog, S is the prompt text
.VALAL: append item to back of list
.WDD: export variables only if they exist in the most local scope
.XLL: plots a list of numbers to a basic graph and saves the image in the plots folder
.ZS|C|JS|C|J: dereference variable
.[LL: promote list to more specific type if possible
.\NN: floorfloor
.]LL: copy list as generic list
._..AN..AN: copies the Nth item on the stack to the top (not including N)

Colon Operators


nametypesinfooverload
:'CC: ord (cast to int)
:<NN|CC|SSNN|CC|SS: less then or equal toleq
:>NN|CC|SSNN|CC|SS: greater than or equal togeq
:CJJ: convert symbol to string name
:DASD|AJDASD|AJD: set dict index
:EDD: number or items in a dict
:IDS|DJDS|DJ: get dict item from key
:KDD: return a list of keys as symbols
:PAA: println to stdout
:R--: readline from stdin
:SSCSC: convert to symbol
:TAA: type of (returns a symbol)
:VDD: return a list of values
:ZNN: sleep (milliseconds)
:_..AN..AN: copies the first N items on the stack (not including N)
:|LLLL: remove all elements in L2 from L1
:~LL: remove duplicates

Misc Operators


nametypesinfooverload
M!NN: factorialfact
M$--: system time in milliseconds
M?N|SN: list op descriptions where N=[0:std, 1:dot, 2:colon, 3:misc]
S: search all help data
MCNN: inverse cosineacos
MDNN: given time in ms, return date params [day_of_week, year, month, day_of_month, hour, min, s]
MHSSSS: parse a date using a given format and return the time in ms
MLNN: base-10 logarithmlog
MODDDD: set D1s metatable to D2
MSNN: inverse sineasin
MTNN: inverse tangentatan
MVLSSNNLSSNN: options title windowhdr msgtype dialogtype MV
msgtype:
1: plain
2: question
3: warning
4: error dialogtype:
1: request string
2: request number
3: alert
4: yes or no
5: option buttons
6: option dropdown
7: choose file
MXDD: plot
parameters:
plottype (::line ::scatter)
title S
xlabel S
ylabel S
height D
width D
xaxis [minD maxD]
yaxis [minD maxD]
x L<N>
y [[nameS strokeD color[r g b] dataL], ..]
show B
legend B
horizontal B
filename S
MZANAN: system functions
S1: change prompt text
A2: get working dir
S3: set working dir
""3: reset working dir
S4: list files in working dir + S
S5: create dir in working dir + S
S6: delete file or dir
McNN: consinecos
MdN|SN: cast to double
S: parse double, if invalid, return 0.0		float
MeNN: exponential functionexp
MhNSNS: convert the time in ms to a date string according to a given format
MkCSCS: add special character
MlNN: natural logarithmln
MoDD: get metatable
MpNN: list primes up to N
MqNN: square rootsqrt
MrNN: convert to rational number
MsNN: sinesin
MtNN: tangenttan
